string.value: You've completed the costume preparation, but she says something is still missing. What could possibly be missing? Ask #bLala#k what else she needs.
#bLala#k says she needs more than just costumes and wants you to bring perfume that would complete each costume.
#bLala#k wasn't sure which scent would go best with which costume, so she gave you some time to think about it. \r\nHm, you don't seem too sure either. Why don't you leave it up to #bLala#k?\r\n

Oh, I've figured it out! We need the right fragrance to go with the right costume, duh! Every piece of clothing needs to be complemented with its own scent. That'll make things perfect, don't you think?

Yes, that's it. If Blake wants to become a star, he needs the right hair, makeup, costume. and smell! We have three costumes, so we'll need three different fragrances.\r\n#bPlease bring me 30 Pink Perfumes, 30 Yellow Perfumes, and 30 Blue Perfumes#k. \r\n
You didn't think that would be enough, did you?
Did you bring the Perfumes I've requested? Let's see 'em!
Mmm, each perfume smells unique and delicious. Yummy. But I don't know which scent goes with which outfit. What do you think, #b#h0##k? I'll give you some time to think it over.
Please bring me #b30 Pink Perfumes, 30 Yellow Perfumes, and 30 Blue Perfumes#k. From what I remember, there is a perfume shop on the 3rd-4th floor of Kerning Square.
